Package org.apache.lucene.analysis.cn.smart.hhmm

SmartChineseAnalyzer Hidden Markov Model package.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
HHMMSegmenter Finds the optimal segmentation of a sentence into Chinese words
SegToken SmartChineseAnalyzer internal token
SegTokenFilter Filters a SegToken by converting full-width latin to half-width, then lowercasing latin.
 

Package org.apache.lucene.analysis.cn.smart.hhmm Description

SmartChineseAnalyzer Hidden Markov Model package.
WARNING: The status of the analyzers/smartcn analysis.cn.smart package is experimental. The APIs and file formats introduced here might change in the future and will not be supported anymore in such a case.
